person.persName: John Mosby Bacon (Franklin County, Kentucky, soldier. )

body.p: Woodford and Franklin County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Sarah Jane Bacon. Resident of Woodford County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Frankfort, Franklin County in 1860. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a second lieutenant from September 27, 1862 to November 5, 1862. Served in the 4th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a second lieutenant, first lieutenant, captain and major from November 5, 1862 to August 21, 1865. Mustered out August 21, 1865.
